info.description:
Kind of mimicking Splatoon 2's ink I guess.

Hold LMB and drag to draw. Hold C while dragging to clear instead of draw.

Press S to create a predetermined wavy line.
Press F to fill the entire image with ink and E to empty the image of ink.
